name: GameBall 3000
description:
A straightforward platformer with a gameboy-style aesthetic.

Controls are the arrow keys.

Created in a 5 day rush for a game jam by a JavaScript programmer who decided to learn both C# and Unity while making this game in one of the worst decisions of his life.

Note that the game is 3 levels and shouldn't take more than a couple minutes to finish.

Also, thanks to https://roguenoodle.itch.io/gbcamera-for-unity for his Unity package that I used for the game's Gameboy aesthetic.
